Title: To Kill in Silence
Writer: Alberto Ardissone (story), Salvatore Laurani (screenplay), Giuseppe Rolando (screenplay), Giuseppe Rolando (story), Mino Roli (dialogue)
Actors: Ottavia Piccolo, Sylva Koscina, Gino Cervi, Rodolfo Baldini
Plot: Valeria (Piccolo) and Gianni (Baldini) are students and soon begin a love affair. When she becomes pregnant, they have to face the decision to have the child or an abortion.
